name: Tiny Dungeons (DataSpot)
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT - LOOKING FOR TESTERS AND FEEDBACK!

This is the first release of the game, which includes most of the core mechanics. You may encounter incomplete features, bugs, and other issues. Please report these if you find them :)

I have a lot planned for the future, and this page will regularly be updated as new content is released!

Your party left you for dead in the lower levels of the dungeon, but a mysterious figure called 'The fortune teller' reanimated you... A sprawling labyrinth, hoards of enemies, and elite bosses stand between you and freedom. Alone, you don't stand a chance, but with the help of The Fortune Teller and his powerful enhancements, you might just make it...
